title: Devblog 42
subtitle: End of Siberia, Sunsetting for RP6, and rebalancing for weapons and enemies.

title: Lead The Way
subtitle: Ladies and Gentlemen, Welcome to Japan
fluff: The world has held its breath long enough- it's turning purple. Campaign 2 releases January 5th, 2026.

title: Siberian Suns
subtitle: Here comes the snow...
fluff: Welcom to Siberia, where relics of old animosities mix with the fire of modern conflict as two nukes go missing in the hands of Ultranationalists.

title: Gold Edition Bonuses
subtitle: Access to Task Force Gold, new weapons, new gadgets, and a booster pack to get you into the game faster.
